<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Deep Roots](/Feats.aspx?ID=3686) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Psychic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=430" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 28</row>

</column>

---

Your mind-control spells send burrowing mental roots that tear at your target's mind when they're removed or run their course. When you Cast a Spell that imposes the [controlled](/Conditions.aspx?ID=6) condition or otherwise forces the target to take certain actions (such as [_command_](/Spells.aspx?ID=45)), you can choose one target that critically failed its save. When that target finishes fulfilling any commands issued by your spell, or when the spell is dispelled or [counteracted](/Rules.aspx?ID=371), the target takes 1d6 mental damage per level of the spell.
name: Deep Roots
